title: Lord Rutherford
brief_description: An historic film of Lord Rutherford, pioneer in atomic physics and winner of 1930 Faraday Medal. New Zealand born Lord Rutherford discusses the structure of atoms, means of breaking up the stable elements, transmutation experiments, the rise in new departments of chemical knowledge and the ultimate structure of matter.
